00225    template <typename T>
00226    inline MemoryIArchive& MemoryIArchive::operator & (T& data)
00227    {  
00228       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00229       return *this;
00230    }
00231 
00235    template <typename T>
00236    inline MemoryIArchive& MemoryIArchive::operator >> (T& data)
00237    {   
00238       serialize(*this, data, version_); 
00239       return *this;
00240    }
00241 
00242    /*
00243    * Unpack one object of type T.
00244    */
00245    template <typename T>
00246    void MemoryIArchive::unpack(T& data)
00247    {
00248       if (cursor_ + sizeof(data) > end_) {
00249          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of packed block");
00250       }
00251       T* ptr = (T *)cursor_;
00252       data = *ptr;
00253       ++ptr;
00254       cursor_ = (Byte *)ptr;
00255    }
00256 
00257    /*
00258    * Read a C-array of objects of type T.
00259    */
00260    template <typename T>
00261    void MemoryIArchive::unpack(T* array, int n)
00262    {
00263       if (cursor_ + n*sizeof(T) > end_) {
00264          UTIL_THROW("Attempted read past end of data");
00265       }
00266       T* ptr = (T *)cursor_;
00267       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00268          array[i] = *ptr;
00269          ++ptr;
00270       }
00271       cursor_ = (Byte *)ptr;
00272    }
00273

00280    inline void serialize(MemoryIArchive& ar, char& data, 
00281                          const unsigned int version)
00282    {  ar.unpack(data); }
